methods.MethodName: Get a list of all masks

parameters.Description: items to return per page

methods.MethodName: Get a list of all bundles

parameters.Name: page
parameters.Description: A page to select from

parameters.Name: cpp
parameters.Description: items to return per page

parameters.Name: filters
parameters.Description: Whether to include a list of all filters for each bundle

parameters.Name: tags
parameters.Description: Whether to include a list of tags

parameters.Name: licenses
parameters.Description: Whether to include a list of license IDs

parameters.Name: related
parameters.Description: Whether to include a list of all related bundles

parameters.Name: incompatible
parameters.Description: Whether to include a list of incompatible bundles

parameters.Name: user_id
parameters.Description: Add a user context and extra attribute stating bundles active state (true/false)

parameters.Name: bundle_id
parameters.Description: Bundle id

parameters.Name: filters
parameters.Description: Whether to include a list of all filters for each bundle

parameters.Name: tags
parameters.Description: Whether to include a list of tags

parameters.Name: licenses
parameters.Description: Whether to include a list of license IDs

parameters.Name: related
parameters.Description: Whether to include a list of all related bundles

parameters.Name: incompatible
parameters.Description: Whether to include a list of incompatible bundles

parameters.Name: user_id
parameters.Description: Add a user context and extra attribute stating bundles active state (true/false)

parameters.Name: name
parameters.Description: The name of the bundle. Must be greater than 5 characters.

parameters.Name: description
parameters.Description: The description of the bundle. Must be greater than 20 characters.

parameters.Name: filter_ids
parameters.Description: A comma separated list of filter IDs to associate with the bundle

parameters.Name: bundle_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the bundle

parameters.Name: description
parameters.Description: The description of the bundle. Must be greater than 20 characters.

parameters.Name: add_filter_ids
parameters.Description: A comma separated list of filter IDs to associate with the bundle

parameters.Name: remove_filter_ids
parameters.Description: A comma separated list of filter IDs to dissociate with the bundle

methods.MethodName: Get a list of all filters

parameters.Name: page
parameters.Description: A page to select from

parameters.Name: cpp
parameters.Description: items to return per page

parameters.Name: bundles
parameters.Description: Whether to include a list of all bundles each filter is part of

parameters.Name: bundles
parameters.Description: Whether to include a list of all bundles each filter is part of

parameters.Name: name
parameters.Description: The name of the filter. Must be greater than 5 characters.

parameters.Name: description
parameters.Description: The description of the filter. Must be greater than 20 characters.

parameters.Name: unit_cost
parameters.Description: The decimal cost per unit (interaction or augmentation)

parameters.Name: content
parameters.Description: The JSON content for the filter (combined into the ACL data structure)

parameters.Name: source
parameters.Description: The interaction source (keep empty for augmentations)

parameters.Name: license_id
parameters.Description: The id of a license related to this filter

parameters.Name: sample
parameters.Description: Sample data rate percentage from 1 to 100

parameters.Name: bundle_ids
parameters.Description: You must specify at least one bundle to associate this filter with

parameters.Name: filter_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the filter.

parameters.Name: name
parameters.Description: The name of the filter. Must be greater than 5 characters.

parameters.Name: description
parameters.Description: The description of the filter. Must be greater than 20 characters.

parameters.Name: unit_cost
parameters.Description: The decimal cost per unit (interaction or augmentation)

parameters.Name: content
parameters.Description: The JSON content for the filter (combined into the ACL data structure)

parameters.Name: source
parameters.Description: The interaction source (keep empty for augmentations)

parameters.Name: license_id
parameters.Description: The id of a license related to this filter

parameters.Name: sample
parameters.Description: Sample data rate percentage from 1 to 100

parameters.Name: add_bundle_ids
parameters.Description: CSV list of bundle IDs to associate this filter with

parameters.Name: remove_bundle_ids
parameters.Description: CSV list of bundle IDs to dissociate this filter with
